headline: Is Corning’s 89.1% Surge in 2025 Justified by Its Long Term Fundamentals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Corning is still a smart buy after its monster run, or if you are arriving just as the party is ending, this breakdown will help you separate long term value from short term hype. The stock has surged to about $88.32, with an 89.1% gain year to date and 86.9% over the last year, even after a slightly negative 30 day return and a modest 2.7% move in the last week. Investors have been reacting to a wave of optimism around Corning's role in advanced materials for...
